text.div:
Generated Narrative: PlanDefinition

Resource PlanDefinition "IMMZ.DT.04.DTP"

url: http://fhir.org/guides/who/smart-immunization/PlanDefinition/IMMZ.DT.04.DTP

version: 0.1.0

name: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP

title: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP

status: draft

date: 2023-03-31 14:38:57+0000

publisher: World Health Organization (WHO)

description: If child or person has not been given DTP, start scheme

jurisdiction: Global (Whole world) (m49.htm#001)

library: IMMZDT04

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - No Doses

description: Provide DTP immunization 1st dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme) if the patient is the older 6 weeks of age

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Weeks" >= 6text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.01

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 1 Dose

description: Provide DTP immunization 2nd dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 3 dose scheme" if the patient is 4-8 weeks after their first dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.02

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 2 Doses

description: Provide DTP immunizations – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 3 dose scheme, provide the 3rd dose" if the patient is 4-8 weeks after their first dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "2 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.03

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 1

description: Provide booster at 12-23 months (DTP-containing vaccine) if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "3 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 1st booster

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Months" >= 12text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 1st booster

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.05

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 2

description: Provide booster at 4-7 years (Td/DT containing vaccine) if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme and 1 booster

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "4 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd booster

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 4text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd booster

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.06

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 3

description: Provide booster at 9-15 years (Td containing vaccine), if >7 years use only aP containing vaccine - if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme and 2 boosters

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "5 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd booster

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 9text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd booster

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.07

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - No Doses at 15 years or older

description: Provide DTP immunization 1st dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.08

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 1 Dose at 15 years or older

description: Provide DTP immunization 2nd dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more and is 4-8 weeks after their first dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" <= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.09

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 2 Doses at 15 years or older

description: Provide DTP immunization 3rd dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more and is 4-8 weeks after their second dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "2 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" <= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.10

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 3 Doses at 15 years or older

description: Provide DTP immunization 4th dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 3 PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more and is 4-8 weeks after their second dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "3 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 4th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 4th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 4th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" <= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 4th dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.11

action

title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 4 Doses at 15 years or older

description: Provide DTP immunization 5th dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 4 PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more and is 4-8 weeks after their second dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"DTP vaccine immunization history" = "4 doses"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 5th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Current Patient Age in Years" >= 15text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 5th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" >= "4 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 5th dose

condition

kind: applicability

Expressions

-DescriptionLanguageExpression
*"Date last DTP dose given" <= "8 weeks"text/cqlShould vaccinate patient for DTP with 5th dose

definition: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP.12

name: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP
title: IMMZ.DT.04.DTP
description: If child or person has not been given DTP, start scheme

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - No Doses
action.description: Provide DTP immunization 1st dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme) if the patient is the older 6 weeks of age

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose
Should vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 1 Dose
action.description: Provide DTP immunization 2nd dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 3 dose scheme" if the patient is  4-8 weeks after their first dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose
Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - 2 Doses
action.description: Provide DTP immunizations – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – 3 dose scheme, provide the 3rd dose" if the patient is  4-8 weeks after their first dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose
Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 1
action.description: Provide booster at 12-23 months (DTP-containing vaccine) if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 1st booster
Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 1st booster

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 2
action.description: Provide booster at 4-7 years (Td/DT containing vaccine)  if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme and 1 booster

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd booster
Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 2nd booster

action.title: Immunize Patient for DTP - Booster 3
action.description: Provide booster at 9-15 years (Td containing vaccine), if >7 years use only aP containing vaccine - if patient has completed primary 3 dose scheme and 2 boosters

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd booster
Should vaccinate patient for DTP with 3rd booster

action.description: Provide DTP immunization 1st dose – using the "DTP vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (5 dose scheme) if the patient is 15 years of age or more

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose
Should vaccinate patient with DTP 1st dose
